column4: Hi! Ubuntu 7.04 crashes when I close enemy territory(game). I can move the mouse, but clicking and pressing keyboard buttons doesn't do anything. Picture of crashed screen: http://priitm.planet.ee/1/IMG_5535.JPG
that doesnt look like a crash... its the credits screen
yes. but pc doesn't react at all.
hitting Esc or Alt F4 does nothing?
